website_summaries.verdict: A suitable model if you need a smaller size to fit your range and kitchen dimensions.
pros: 30-inch size works well in kitchens that have limited space
Stainless steel construction works well in modern homes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Telescopic Downdraft
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, easy to install, works perfectly. It’s a real space saver over, under and on the counter. Fit perfectly in our existing cabinet. Chose it over getting another downdraft cooktop and that allowed us to have many more options for our new gas cooktop
customer_reviews.author: Mike T

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: Took FOREVER to get - it is okay. They haven't changed this product in 20 years.. but they did discontinue my BEST downdraft system. This make and model replaced it just fine. Wish they had it in black finish to match the rest of the black appliances.
customer_reviews.author: Buys Prime

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but difficult to install
customer_reviews.text: If you are an experienced DIY'er, you will be able to handle this. Just read the instructions carefully(I had to find full instructions online) and be sure it's straight, level and precise, and you'll be happy.
customer_reviews.author: Hosedog

customer_reviews.title: Nice downdraft vent for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement downdraft. We replaced a Kitchenaide that was no longer working. I was happy to get at less than $600. Had priced withe several appliance stores and they wanted over $1700 for replacement
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: Came damaged and without installation instructions
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with instructions to install, one part was damaged. Finally got it "installed" the best we could, and by a contractor no less, only to find out when the granite people came to install the counters that it was not installed correctly. The contractor told us there were no instructions, and he did his best to find some online, but our vent did not come with the things it was supposed to come with to install it. So we had to take it out because we can't use it. A waste of $500. And it is 1.5 weeks past the return date, so we can't get a refund now.
customer_reviews.author: JL. Moses

customer_reviews.title: Exact replacement t
customer_reviews.text: Fit as a replacement for the previous one (Magic Chef brand) that stopped working after many years. Fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: M Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Better than overhead exhaust. Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Operating for 6 months now and no issues. Great suction right at the source. Why pay more...great value
customer_reviews.author: Chemical Rick

customer_reviews.title: Made it in one piece
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. As others mentioned, packaging was totally not cushioned enough, surprised it survived with minimal bumps and scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Ronn

customer_reviews.title: Exhaust was not in a compatible position to the underfloor ...
customer_reviews.text: Exhaust was not in a compatible position to the underfloor framing, and when returned the company charged a 15% restocking fee of which I was unaware of when ordering. With the $132 that it cost me to ship it back, one would hope not to have incurred this charge for an uninstalled unit.
customer_reviews.author: c t

customer_reviews.title: So far so good..
customer_reviews.text: I just installed the down draft 2 weeks ago. So far so good...a little noisy!!!. But now a few days ago the device started to vibrate a little. Please contact me to guide me for remedy. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: EA

customer_reviews.title: Really high quality product
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good product, it come with a dent in the top trim piece. I contacted nutone and they had me a replacement piece at the house in two days. The only issue I seen was it was a little tight fastening the locking bolts down and the bottom brackets in a 32 inch cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Allen Cook

customer_reviews.title: Great suction
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this to replace a broken downdraft exhaust! We had someone install it and it took some extra work. However, once in, it worked beautifully with adjustable levels of suction which correlates with the level of noise! It works beautifully though, sucks up all the cooking smells!
customer_reviews.author: 4EVABLACKADESHI

customer_reviews.title: Terrific piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: This exhaust system works exceptionally well. I ordered it to replace a similar old model, and we've been very pleased with it. Installation required help from a local technician. The noise level when in operation depends on how high you set the adjustable fan speed.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Falley

customer_reviews.title: Hard to turn on
customer_reviews.text: The fan is really hard to turn on because the button gets stuck. Plus it’s in a weird place
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than an old one I replaced, which is a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Bath remodel

product_meta.title: Nutone 273003 30-inch Stainless Steel Island Range Hood
product_meta.description: Upgrade your kitchen with the Broan Telescopic Downdraft Stainless Steel Range Hood. This retractable downdraft hood is ideal for use with island and peninsula countertops. This innovative downdraft system is compatible with virtually all self-contained cooktops. Designed to fit rectangular ductwork for simple installation, this downdraft also offers an adjustable variable fan speed controlled by a reliable rotary control, ensuring ease of use. Included are 2 washable aluminum filters for easy maintenance and cleaning. This range hood downdraft is backed by a 1 year limited warranty and measures 29.5" H x 7" L x 30" W. Broan leads the industry with forward-thinking residential ventilation products, customized climate, communications and home automation solutions along with award winning customer service. Broan’s inspiring heritage provides the foundation for its three global brands – Broan, NuTone and BEST.
feature_bullets: STAINLESS STEEL DOWNDRAFT RANGE HOOD: 500 CFM internal blower is compatible with virtually all self-contained cooktops
COMPATIBLE: Retractable downdraft hood space-saving design is ideal for use with kitchen islands and peninsula countertops
SIMPLE INSTALLATION: Designed to fit rectangular ductwork and can be installed horizontal or vertical for simple installation
ADJUSTABLE SPEED CONTROL: Infinitely adjustable speed control is flush with the side of the unit
ONE YEAR LIMITED WARRANTY: Downdraft hood is backed by a one year limited warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars22 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
